cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.utilities

Class ArticlesTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.utilities.ArticlesTranslator

  • public class ArticlesTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to translate all the articles from L1 into L2 in a folder with the structure of Wikicardi: path/plain/L1/index/id.L1.txt The index files with the position of the articles and its length is required.
    Since:
    Feb 18, 2015 TODO: Convert into a cli? TODO: think of moses as a server and/or apache's tika library
    Author:
    cristina

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateSetsCommon(java.lang.String commonArticles, boolean onlyMissing)
      Looks for the index files in the given folder and generates temporal files (tokenised) to be translated with only the articles that also appear in file String commonArticles.
      void generateSetsFullFolder(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> commonIDs, boolean onlyMissing)
      Looks for the index files in the given folder and generates temporal files (tokenised) to be translated.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      java.lang.String mirrorCommonArticles2Langs(java.lang.String commonArticles)
      Method for converting the file with the articles in common L1.icat1.L2.icat2.method into the mirror file with L2.icat2.L1.icat1.method.
      void reconstructTradArticles(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> commonIDs, boolean onlyMissing)
      Given the original index files and the temporal files already translated, the method reconstructs the translation of every individual article and saves them in path/plain/L1/index/id.trad.L2.txt
      void reconstructTradArticlesCommon(java.lang.String commonArticles, boolean onlyMissing)
      Given the original index files and the temporal files already translated, the method reconstructs the translation of every individual article that was originally in the file of common articles and saves them in path/plain/L1/index/id.trad.L2.txt
      void translateSets(java.lang.String translator, int sgeThreads)
      Main method to call the decoder String translator for all the files generated by generateSetsFullFolder().

      • translateSets

        public void translateSets(java.lang.String translator,
                 int sgeThreads)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                          java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Main method to call the decoder String translator for all the files generated by generateSetsFullFolder(). The processes are distributed among the available processors.

        translator -

      • generateSetsCommon

        public void generateSetsCommon(java.lang.String commonArticles,
                      boolean onlyMissing)
        Looks for the index files in the given folder and generates temporal files (tokenised) to be translated with only the articles that also appear in file String commonArticles. TODO also lowercase?? These files are the concatenation of the articles in the corresponding index folder with length
        Parameters:
        onlyMissing -

      • generateSetsFullFolder

        public void generateSetsFullFolder(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> commonIDs,
                          boolean onlyMissing)
        Looks for the index files in the given folder and generates temporal files (tokenised) to be translated. (TODO also lowercase??) These files are the concatenation of the articles in the corresponding index folder with length

      • mirrorCommonArticles2Langs

        public java.lang.String mirrorCommonArticles2Langs(java.lang.String commonArticles)
        Method for converting the file with the articles in common L1.icat1.L2.icat2.method into the mirror file with L2.icat2.L1.icat1.method. It can be used to translate articles in both directions.
        Parameters:
        commonArticles -
        Returns:
        String with the name of the new file
